title: eDatingDoc Academy
description:
eDatingDoc Academy

You get the training you need to boost your online dating results and get the girl you want.
Every area of online dating is covered with laser-like focus with the On-Demand quick-action video training & quick-action worksheets.


Online dating vs. PUA (Pick Up Artist) training:
Cost:
A pick-up artist can literally cost nothing; however with internet dating you at least need to pay for internet access.
Time:
While internet dating may require fair amount of time to send out messages and go on dates, learning pick-up is like training a martial arts.
Quality:
On dating sites, attractive women are bombarded by messages, whereas in real life men rarely have the balls to hit on women. So by a long shot PUAs have a wider selection and considerably less competition.
Compatibility:
Trying to find a geeky, vegetarian redhead who enjoys the work of Chuck Palahniuk, in your local bar is hard work. Online; however, they are just click away. Online dating wins.

To sum up:
Online dating is very much centred on finding someone who is a good match for you and in this case is an immensely effective tool.
Alternatively, pick-up concentrates more on guys learning how to be attractive to women and teaches them how to act in the real world.
Thus, both areas should be combined to create maximum benefit.
